text: Ralph Perne (fl. 1555) was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Dorchester in 1555. There is no further record of a Ralph Perne, but he may be the glover, Ralph Peryn, who was a bailiff and constable in Dorchester. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:English MPs 1555 Category:Members of the Parliament of England for Dorchester
title: Ralph Perne
